name: hypoxia
content:

medical a condition in which there is not enough oxygen available to the blood and body tissues: Doctors are learning more about the threat that affects every airline passenger: hypoxia, the term for too little oxygen. After major surgery hypoxia can occur for up to for 3 days, particularly at night.
biology, chemistry, environment a situation in which there is not enougth oxygen in a place or environment: His team studied fish in an estuary suffering hypoxia. Hypoxia is an oxygen deficiency in water that threatens the survival of many species. Related word
